concept.title: Upgrading in a Docker environment
concept.shortdesc: System administrators can upgradeBefore you upgrade to version 1.2 from version 1.1.0.1, it is good practice to create a backup of the version 1.1.0.1 configuration. You can also create a backup version of the version 1.1.0.1 store; you must apply interim fix 1.1.0.1-IBM-IMA-IFIT05459 if you need to back up the store.

conbody.p: A backup of the version 1.1.0.1 configuration is required if the upgraded appliance needs to be rolled back to version 1.1.0.1. You might also need to back up the version 1.1.0.1 store if you determine that the state of the store is important before you perform the upgrade operation; the store data can be restored as part of the rollback process.
